original: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ bhaggesu viharati susumāra gire bhesakaḷā vane migadāye

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno abbhokāse caṅkamati.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ abbhokāse caṅkamati

original: Tena kho pana samayena māro pāpimā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa kucchigato hoti koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭho.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena māraḥ pāpimā āyasmataḥ mahāmoggallānassa kucchi gataḥ hoti koṭṭham anupaviṭṭhaḥ
atha khalu āyasmataḥ mahāmoggallānassa etat ahosi

original: “kiṁ nu kho me kucchi garugaro viya?
Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno caṅkamā orohitvā vihāraṁ pavisitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno caṅkamā orohitvā vihāram pavisitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Nisajja kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno paccattaṁ yoniso manasākāsi.
analyzed: nisajja kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno paccattam yonisaḥ manasā akāsi

original: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno māraṁ pāpimantaṁ kucchigataṁ koṭṭhamanupaviṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ māram pāpimantam kucchi gatam koṭṭham anupaviṭṭha
mā tathāgatam vihesesi mā tathāgata sāvaka

original: Mā te ahosi dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyā”ti.
analyzed: mā te ahosi dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya ati
atha kho mārassa pāpimataḥ etat ahosi

original: “ajānameva kho maṁ ayaṁ samaṇo apassaṁ evamāha:
analyzed: a jānam eva khalu mam ayam samaṇaḥ a passam evam āha
mā tathāgatam vihesesi mā tathāgata sāvaka

original: Mā te ahosi dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyā’ti.
analyzed: mā te ahosi dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya ati

original: Yopissa so satthā sopi maṁ neva khippaṁ jāneyya, kuto pana maṁ ayaṁ sāvako jānissatī”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ pissa saḥ satthā saḥ api mam na iva khippam jāneyya kutas pana mama ayam sāvakaḥ jānissati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno māraṁ pāpimantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai mahāmoggallānaḥ māram pāpimantam etat avoca

original: “evampi kho tāhaṁ, pāpima, jānāmi, mā tvaṁ maññittho:
analyzed: evam pi khalu tāha pāpima jānāmi mā tvam maññitthaḥ

original: ‘ajānameva kho maṁ ayaṁ samaṇo apassaṁ evamāha—
analyzed: a jānam eva khalu mam ayam samaṇaḥ a passam evam āha
mā tathāgatam vihesesi mā tathāgata sāvaka

original: Mā te ahosi dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyāti.
analyzed: mā te ahosi dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya ati

original: Yopissa so satthā sopi maṁ neva khippaṁ jāneyya, kuto pana maṁ ayaṁ sāvako jānissatī’”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ pissa saḥ satthā saḥ api mam na iva khippam jāneyya kutas pana mama ayam sāvakaḥ jānissati iti
atha kho mārassa pāpimataḥ etat ahosi

original: “jānameva kho maṁ ayaṁ samaṇo passaṁ evamāha:
analyzed: jānam eva kho mam ayam samaṇaḥ passam evam āha
mā tathāgatam vihesesi mā tathāgata sāvaka

original: Mā te ahosi dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyā’”ti.
analyzed: mā te ahosi dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya ati

original: Atha kho māro pāpimā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa mukhato uggantvā paccaggaḷe aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho māraḥ pāpimā āyasmataḥ mahāmoggallānassa mukhataḥ uggantvā paccaggaḷe aṭṭhāsi

original: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno māraṁ pāpimantaṁ paccaggaḷe ṭhitaṁ;
analyzed: addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ māram pāpimantam paccaggaḷe ṭhita

original: “etthāpi kho tāhaṁ, pāpima, passāmi; mā tvaṁ maññittho
analyzed: ettha api kho tāha pāpima passāmi mā tvam maññitthaḥ

original: Bhūtapubbāhaṁ, pāpima, dūsī nāma māro ahosiṁ, tassa me kāḷī nāma bhaginī.
analyzed: bhūta pubbā āha pāpima dūsī nāma māraḥ ahosi tassa me kāḷī nāma bhaginī

original: Tena kho pana, pāpima, samayena kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
analyzed: tena khalu pana pāpima samayena kakusandhaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ loke uppannaḥ hoti

original: Kakusandhassa kho pana, pāpima, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa vidhurasañjīvaṁ nāma sāvakayugaṁ ahosi aggaṁ bhaddayugaṁ.
analyzed: kakusandhassa kho pana pāpima bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa vidhurasañjīvam nāma sāvaka yugam ahosi aggam bhadda yuga

original: Yāvatā kho pana, pāpima, kakusandhassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa sāvakā.
analyzed: yāvatā kho pana pāpima kakusandhassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa sāvakā

original: Tesu na ca koci āyasmatā vidhurena samasamo hoti yadidaṁ dhammadesanāya.
analyzed: tesu na ca koci āyasmatā vidhurena samasamaḥ hoti yat idam dhamma desanāya

original: Iminā kho evaṁ, pāpima, pariyāyena āyasmato vidhurassa vidhuroteva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: iminā kho eva pāpima pariyāyena āyasmataḥ vidhurassa samaññā udapādi

original: Āyasmā pana, pāpima, sañjīvo araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi appakasireneva saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjati.
analyzed: āyasmā pana pāpima sañjīvaḥ arañña gataḥ api rukkha mūla gataḥ api suññāgāra gataḥ api appa kasirena iva saññā vedayita nirodham samāpajjati

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, pāpima, āyasmā sañjīvo aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpanno nisinno hoti.
analyzed: bhūta pubba pāpima āyasmā sañjīvaḥ aññatarasmim rukkha mūle saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannaḥ nisinnaḥ hoti

original: Addasaṁsu kho, pāpima, gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino āyasmantaṁ sañjīvaṁ aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannaṁ nisinnaṁ;
analyzed: addasasu kho pāpima gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino āyasmantam sañjīvam aññatarasmim rukkha mūle saññā vedayita nirodham samāpannam nisinna
acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Atha kho te, pāpima, gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca gomayañca saṅkaḍḍhitvā āyasmato sañjīvassa kāye upacinitvā aggiṁ datvā pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te pāpima gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvinaḥ tiṇam ca kaṭṭham ca gomayañca saṅkaḍḍhitvā āyasmataḥ sañjīvassa kāye upacinitvā aggim datvā pakkamisu

original: Atha kho, pāpima, āyasmā sañjīvo tassā rattiyā accayena tāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhahitvā cīvarāni papphoṭetvā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho pāpimaḥ āyasmā sañjīvaḥ tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena tāya samāpattiyāḥ vuṭṭhahitvā cīvarāni papphoṭetvā pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya gāmam piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Addasaṁsu kho te, pāpima, gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino āyasmantaṁ sañjīvaṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ;
analyzed: addasasu kho te pāpima gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvinaḥ āyasmantam sañjīvam piṇḍāya caranta
acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Ayaṁ samaṇo nisinnakova kālaṅkato, svāyaṁ paṭisañjīvito’ti.
analyzed: ayam samaṇaḥ nisinnakaḥ uva kālaṅkato su āyam paṭisañjīvitaḥ iti

original: Iminā kho evaṁ, pāpima, pariyāyena āyasmato sañjīvassa sañjīvoteva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: iminā kho eva pāpima pariyāyena āyasmataḥ sañjīvassa sañjīvā uta iva samaññā udapādi

original: Atha kho, pāpima, dūsissa mārassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho pāpima dūsissa mārassa etat ahosi

original: ‘imesaṁ kho ahaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sīlavantānaṁ kalyāṇadhammānaṁ neva jānāmi āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā.
analyzed: imesam kho aham bhikkhūnam sīlavantānam kalyāṇa dhammānam na iva jānāmi āgatim vā gatim vā
yat nūna aham brāhmaṇa gahapatike anvāviseyya

original: etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme akkosatha paribhāsatha rosetha vihesetha.
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇa dhamme akkosatha paribhāsatha rosetha vihesetha

original: Appeva nāma tumhehi akkosiyamānānaṁ paribhāsiyamānānaṁ rosiyamānānaṁ vihesiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ, yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma tumhehi akkosiyamānānam paribhāsiyamānānam rosiyamānānam vihesiyamānānam siyā cittassa aññathatta yathā tam dūsī māraḥ labhetha otāranti

original: Atha kho te, pāpima, dūsī māro brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi:
analyzed: atha kho te pāpima dūsī māraḥ brāhmaṇa gahapatike anvāvisi

original: ‘etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme akkosatha paribhāsatha rosetha vihesetha.
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇa dhamme akkosatha paribhāsatha rosetha vihesetha

original: Appeva nāma tumhehi akkosiyamānānaṁ paribhāsiyamānānaṁ rosiyamānānaṁ vihesiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ, yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma tumhehi akkosiyamānānam paribhāsiyamānānam rosiyamānānam vihesiyamānānam siyā cittassa aññathatta yathā tam dūsī māraḥ labhetha otāranti

original: Atha kho te, pāpima, brāhmaṇagahapatikā anvāvisiṭṭhā dūsinā mārena bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesenti:
analyzed: atha kho te brāhmaṇa gahapatikāḥ anvāvisiṭṭhāḥ dūsinā mārena bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇa dhamme akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesenti

original: ‘ime pana muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā madhurakajātā jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyanti.
analyzed: ime pana muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhāḥ bandhupādāpaccā jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā ati pattakkhandhāḥ adhomukhāḥ madhuraka jātāḥ jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyanti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma ulūko rukkhasākhāyaṁ mūsikaṁ maggayamāno jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati;
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma ulūkaḥ rukkha sākhāyam mūsikam maggayamānaḥ jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati

original: evamevime muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā madhurakajātā jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyanti.
analyzed: evam eva ime muṇḍakā samaṇakāḥ ibbhā kiṇhāḥ bandhupādāpaccāḥ jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā ati pattakkhandhāḥ adhomukhāḥ madhuraka jātāḥ jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyanti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma kotthu nadītīre macche maggayamāno jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati;
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma kotthu nadī tīre macche maggayamānaḥ jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati

original: evamevime muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā madhurakajātā jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyanti.
analyzed: evam eva ime muṇḍakā samaṇakāḥ ibbhā kiṇhāḥ bandhupādāpaccāḥ jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā ati pattakkhandhāḥ adhomukhāḥ madhuraka jātāḥ jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyanti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma biḷāro sandhisamalasaṅkaṭīre mūsikaṁ maggayamāno jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati;
analyzed: sa iyyathā api nāma biḷāraḥ sandhi samala saṅkaṭīre mūsikam maggayamānaḥ jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati

original: evamevime muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā madhurakajātā jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyanti.
analyzed: evam eva ime muṇḍakā samaṇakāḥ ibbhā kiṇhāḥ bandhupādāpaccāḥ jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā ati pattakkhandhāḥ adhomukhāḥ madhuraka jātāḥ jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyanti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma gadrabho vahacchinno sandhisamalasaṅkaṭīre jhāyati pajjhāyati nijjhāyati apajjhāyati;

original: evamevime muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kiṇhā bandhupādāpaccā “jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā”ti pattakkhandhā adhomukhā madhurakajātā jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyantī’ti.
analyzed: evam eva ime muṇḍakā samaṇakāḥ ibbhā kiṇhāḥ bandhupādāpaccāḥ jhāyinosmā jhāyinosmā ati pattakkhandhāḥ adhomukhāḥ madhuraka jātāḥ jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti apajjhāyanti iti

original: Ye kho pana, pāpima, tena samayena manussā kālaṁ karonti yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
analyzed: ye kho pana pāpima tena samayena manussā kālam karonti yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjanti

original: Atha kho, pāpima, kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho pāpima kakusandhaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ bhikkhū āmantesi
anvāviṭṭhā kho bhikkhave brāhmaṇa gahapatikā dūsinā mārena

original: etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme akkosatha paribhāsatha rosetha vihesetha,
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇa dhamme akkosatha paribhāsatha rosetha vihesetha

original: appeva nāma tumhehi akkosiyamānānaṁ paribhāsiyamānānaṁ rosiyamānānaṁ vihesiyamānānaṁ
analyzed: appā iva nāma tumhehi akkosiyamānānam paribhāsiyamānānam rosiyamānānam vihesiyamānānam

original: siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ, yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran’ti.
analyzed: siyā cittassa aññathatta yathā tam dūsī māraḥ labhetha otāranti

original: Etha, tumhe, bhikkhave, mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha, tathā
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhave mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharatha tathā

original: dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya
analyzed: tathā tatiya tathā catutthaḥ iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya

analyzed: sabbāvantam lokam mettā sahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena

analyzed: upekkhā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharatha tathā dutiya tathā tatiya

analyzed: tathā catutthaḥ iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam upekkhā sahagatena

original: Atha kho te, pāpima, bhikkhū kakusandhena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena evaṁ

original: cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā vihariṁsu, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ.

original: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā

original: ‘evampi kho ahaṁ karonto imesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sīlavantānaṁ kalyāṇadhammānaṁ neva jānāmi āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā, yannūnāhaṁ brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāviseyyaṁ:

original: “etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme sakkarotha garuṁ karotha mānetha pūjetha,
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇa dhamme sakkarotha garum karotha mānetha pūjetha

original: appeva nāma tumhehi sakkariyamānānaṁ garukariyamānānaṁ māniyamānānaṁ pūjiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ, yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran”’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma tumhehi sakkariyamānānam garukariyamānānam māniyamānānam pūjiyamānānam siyā cittassa aññathatta yathā tam dūsī māraḥ labhetha otāranti

original: Atha kho te, pāpima, dūsī māro brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi:
analyzed: atha kho te pāpima dūsī māraḥ brāhmaṇa gahapatike anvāvisi

original: ‘etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme sakkarotha garuṁ karotha mānetha pūjetha,
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇa dhamme sakkarotha garum karotha mānetha pūjetha

original: appeva nāma tumhehi sakkariyamānānaṁ garukariyamānānaṁ māniyamānānaṁ pūjiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ, yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma tumhehi sakkariyamānānam garukariyamānānam māniyamānānam pūjiyamānānam siyā cittassa aññathatta yathā tam dūsī māraḥ labhetha otāranti

original: Atha kho te, pāpima, brāhmaṇagahapatikā anvāviṭṭhā dūsinā mārena bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme sakkaronti garuṁ karonti mānenti pūjenti.
analyzed: atha kho te brāhmaṇa gahapatikāḥ anvāviṭṭhāḥ dūsinā mārena bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇa dhamme sakkaronti garum karonti mānenti pūjenti

original: Ye kho pana, pāpima, tena samayena manussā kālaṁ karonti yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
analyzed: ye kho pana pāpima tena samayena manussā kālam karonti yebhuyyena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti

original: Atha kho, pāpima, kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho pāpima kakusandhaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ bhikkhū āmantesi
anvāviṭṭhā kho bhikkhave brāhmaṇa gahapatikā dūsinā mārena

original: “etha, tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme sakkarotha garuṁ karotha mānetha pūjetha,
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhū sīlavante kalyāṇa dhamme sakkarotha garum karotha mānetha pūjetha

original: appeva nāma tumhehi sakkariyamānānaṁ garukariyamānānaṁ māniyamānānaṁ pūjiyamānānaṁ siyā cittassa aññathattaṁ, yathā taṁ dūsī māro labhetha otāran”ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma tumhehi sakkariyamānānam garukariyamānānam māniyamānānam pūjiyamānānam siyā cittassa aññathatta yathā tam dūsī māraḥ labhetha otāranti

original: Etha, tumhe, bhikkhave, asubhānupassino kāye viharatha, āhāre paṭikūlasaññino, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññino, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassino’ti.
analyzed: tumhe bhikkhave asubha anupassinaḥ kāye viharatha āhāre paṭikūla saññinaḥ sabba loke anabhirati saññinaḥ sabba saṅkhāresu anicca anupassinaḥ ti

original: Atha kho te, pāpima, bhikkhū kakusandhena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena evaṁ
analyzed: atha kho te pāpima bhikkhū kakusandhena bhagavatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena eva

original: ovadiyamānā evaṁ anusāsiyamānā araññagatāpi rukkhamūlagatāpi suññāgāragatāpi asubhānupassino
analyzed: ovadiyamānāḥ evam anusāsiyamānāḥ arañña gatāḥ api rukkha mūla gatāḥ api suññāgāra gatāḥ api asubha anupassinaḥ

original: kāye vihariṁsu, āhāre paṭikūlasaññino, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññino, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassino.
analyzed: kāye viharisu āhāre paṭikūla saññinaḥ sabba loke anabhirati saññinaḥ sabba saṅkhāresu anicca anupassinaḥ

original: Atha kho, pāpima, kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āyasmatā vidhurena pacchāsamaṇena gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho pāpima kakusandhaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya āyasmatā vidhurena pacchā samaṇena gāmam piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Atha kho, pāpima, dūsī māro aññataraṁ kumārakaṁ anvāvisitvā sakkharaṁ gahetvā āyasmato vidhurassa sīse pahāramadāsi; sīsaṁ vobhindi.
analyzed: atha kho pāpima dūsī māraḥ aññataram kumārakam anvāvisitvā sakkharam gahetvā āyasmataḥ vidhurassa sīse pahāram adāsi sīsam vobhindi

original: Atha kho, pāpima, āyasmā vidhuro bhinnena sīsena lohitena gaḷantena kakusandhaṁyeva bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
analyzed: atha kho pāpimaḥ āyasmā vidhuraḥ bhinnena sīsena lohitena gaḷantena kakusandhayā iva bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddham piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ anubandhi

original: Atha kho, pāpima, kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho nāgāpalokitaṁ apalokesi:
analyzed: atha kho pāpima kakusandhaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ nāga apalokitam apalokesi
na vā ayam dūsī māraḥ mattam aññāsi iti

original: Sahāpalokanāya ca pana, pāpima, dūsī māro tamhā ca ṭhānā cavi mahānirayañca upapajji.
analyzed: saha apalokanāya ca pana māro tamhā ca ṭhānā mahānirayam ca upapajji

original: Tassa kho pana, pāpima, mahānirayassa tayo nāmadheyyā honti—
analyzed: tassa kho pana pāpima mahānirayassa tayaḥ nāmadheyyāḥ honti

original: chaphassāyataniko itipi, saṅkusamāhato itipi, paccattavedaniyo itipi.
analyzed: cha phassa āyatanikaḥ itipi saṅku samāhataḥ itipi paccatta vedaniyaḥ itipi

original: Atha kho maṁ, pāpima, nirayapālā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha khalu ma pāpima niraya pālāḥ upasaṅkamitvā etat avocuḥ

original: ‘yadā kho te, mārisa, saṅkunā saṅku hadaye samāgaccheyya.
analyzed: yadā kho te mārisa saṅkunā saṅku hadaye samāgaccheyya
vassa sahassam me niraye paccamānassa ati

original: So kho ahaṁ, pāpima, bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni tasmiṁ mahāniraye apacciṁ.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha pāpima bahūni vassāni bahūni vassa satāni bahūni vassa sahassāni tasmin mahāniraye apacci

original: Dasavassasahassāni tasseva mahānirayassa ussade apacciṁ vuṭṭhānimaṁ nāma vedanaṁ vediyamāno.
analyzed: dasa vassa sahassāni tassa iva mahānirayassa ussade apaccim nāma vedanam vediyamānaḥ

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, pāpima, evarūpo kāyo hoti, seyyathāpi manussassa.
analyzed: tassa pāpimaḥ evarūpaḥ kāyaḥ hoti seyyathā api manussassa
evarūpam sīsam hoti sā iyyathā api macchassa

original: Dūsī ca māro dasamo ca vaggo.
analyzed: dūsī ca māraḥ dasamaḥ ca vaggo
